divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home,east bound on 161East towards New Albany, coming from 270 e of columbus, when i was 1 mile from my exit- i looked up out of my window and saw an oval-like shaped object flying east as well.At first i thought it was just a plane,but as i watched it was very shiny & silver like in color,& there were no clouds around it.I was driving 60mph,and this thing looked to be keeping pace with me,untill it suddenly stopped.I quickly checked the time,then looked back it was still there for another 2 minutes aprox.I put on my brake to slow down and watch it stay stationary,but then i had to look away for a few seconds,then when i looked back-it was gone. I don't know for sure what it was.I know it wasn't an airplane.I've seen several strange things like this lately.On the 3rd of Feb. I and another guy in the Kroger parking lot of New Albany looked up at sunset at this bright cirle like object moving very fast across the sky.I just got in my car and left. But he kept on staring at it.I dunno what it was either.
Summary: I saw an oval-like shaped object,very shiny & silver looking flying in daylight hours.I knew it was no plane when it stopped moving,then gone in 4 minutes.
